page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content: Lapford village is built on a hill.In the village there are over three hundred {houses}.At the bottom of the village is a new{housing estate }.The new homes are built of brick and slate.Many of these{new houses}are bungalows for retired people.The{older {houses}of the village are made of{ {cob}and {thatch}.Cob is a mixture of mud,straw and stones.Some of the cob houses are over four hundred years old.There as a great variety of { {houses types}from large detached houses to small terrace cottages .Within the village there is the Grange, the Rectory and Church. There are also four {shops}in the village . Many old properties are being renovated by people new to the village.
